property.name: installation_dir
property.description: Path where this service will be installed.

property.name: management_password
property.description: Password for the admin user of the management console. If not set, or if left as the default 'NOTAPASSWORD' there will be no admin user available.

property.name: ip_address
property.description: Public ip address JBoss will bind to. 0.0.0.0 implies any ip address.

property.name: ip_address_management
property.description: Management ip address JBoss will bind to. 0.0.0.0 implies any ip address which. This is not recommended for the management services.

property.name: management_native_port
property.description: native port for the management interface

property.name: management_http_port
property.description: http port for the management interface

property.name: management_https_port
property.description: https port for the management interface

property.name: mail_server
property.description: Address of the default mail server

property.name: mail_port
property.description: Port of the default mail server
